page.title: 14Life in Brixington.
page.content: I live at{1 Diane Close,Exmouth}I like my house and my family.I would like my bedroom to be a bit bigger and have a room built just for the animals that had a door going into the garden.My brother and I go to{Brixington Junior {School.}My teacher is called Miss Brimblecombe.Our school has its own outdoor swimming pool,but I wish it was indoor and heated because it is freezing cold!We have many clubs in our school and I go to choir.We recently performed the{Wizard Of Oz.}I wish that there were more playing areas around Brixington.It would be nice for everyone if we had a big leisure centre that had a swimming pool and a playing field.We could easily do without these things but life would be a lot easier and happier if we did have them.The only problem is ,where do we find the money!
